data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naruse, Tohru, Segawa, Ryoko, Shokita, Shigemitsu (2004): Amamiku, a new genus for the true freshwater crab, Candidiopotamon amamense Minei, 1973 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Potamidae), from the Central Ryukyu Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 653: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158012
